sentences.en: Accordingly, the core of agricultural industrialization is to build interest community.
sentences.cn: 因此, 农业产业化的核心是建立利益共同体.

sentences.en: Agrotechnical promotion is supporting the process of agricultural industrialization again.
sentences.cn: 农业技术推广又支撑着农业产业化的进程.

sentences.en: And, at this point, traces of industrialization can only be found in sediments in Europe.
sentences.cn: 而在这一点上，工业化的痕迹只在欧洲的沉积物中找到。

sentences.en: Executive agriculture industrialization, establish and breeding dominant industry project is decisive link.
sentences.cn: 实施农业产业化, 确立和培育主导产业项目是要害性环节.

sentences.en: How shall we proceed with our industrialization?
sentences.cn: 我们的工业化怎样搞 呢 ?

sentences.en: Industrialization inevitably led to the expansion of the urban working class.
sentences.cn: 工业化不可避免地导致了城市工人阶级人数的增多.

sentences.en: Ironically, much of the labor - facilitating industrialization came from the rural areas themselves.
sentences.cn: 出人意外的是, 这些节省劳力的工业化,多数是从农区本身开始的.

sentences.en: It is natural to view industrialization as a force contributing to overall economic improvements.
sentences.cn: 把工业化看作是有助于全面改善经济的一种力量,这是很自然的.

sentences.en: Lead in the quality related industrialization process and assure product and process quality / quantity of supplied parts.
sentences.cn: 领导的质量相关的工业化进程，确保供应商零部件产品和流程的质量/数量。

sentences.en: Significant progress was made in R & D activities and in their industrialization.
sentences.cn: 科技研究开发及产业化取得较大进展.

sentences.en: Stock raising industrialization is the important step that achieves stock raising modernization.
sentences.cn: 畜牧业产业化是实现畜牧业现代化的重要步骤.

sentences.en: The " big push " for rapid industrialization was the code word for development and growth.
sentences.cn: 以迅速工业化为目的的 “ 大推进 ” 是发展与增长的密诀.

sentences.en: The basic goal of the reformists is the same: to realize the industrialization of economy and the democratization of politics.
sentences.cn: 从整体上看，改良思想家的基本目标是一致的，即：实现经济工业化和政治民主化。

sentences.en: The case usually made for industrialization can be readily set out.
sentences.cn: 通常为工业化所提出的理由是易于列举的.

sentences.en: The geographic distribution of lung cancer was dissimilar to that of industrialization.
sentences.cn: 肺癌的地理分布同工业化的分布不尽相同.

sentences.en: Therefore, we reinforced the support to the patent industrialization.
sentences.cn: 加大对专利产业化专项资助的力度.

sentences.en: This balance is being upset by industrialization and the reckless exploitation of the environment.
sentences.cn: 这种平衡状态正在被工业化和不顾一切开发环境所破坏.

sentences.en: Urbanization, although seeming to be an irreversible result of population growth, is caused by both gentrification and industrialization in fact.
sentences.cn: 城市化现象，虽然看起来是人口增长的必然结果，事实上是由士绅化与工业化所造成的。 。

sentences.en: We can't hold out against industrialization any longer.
sentences.cn: 我们不能再拒绝工业化了.

sentences.en: With the industrialization of food production and the globalization of its marketing, efforts to ensure food safety likewise take on an international dimension.
sentences.cn: 随着食品生产的工业化及其销售的全球化，努力确保食品安全的工作也同样具有了国际意义。

words.tran_cn: 工业的，产业的；从事工业的；供工业用的；来自勤劳的
产业主义，工业主义；工业制度
实业家；工业家；产业工人
使工业化；将…组成产业（industrialize的过去分词）

trans.tran_en: when a country or place develops a lot of industry
